tool_description:
Our WebService API lets you create QR Code inside your own system of information (application, industrial platform, website..).
It is a solution for computer developpers that grants them the possibility to create QR Codes inside their own mechanism
name: Custom QR Code
title: Custom QR Code

api_list.name: Generate a QR Code image
api_list.description: The "data" parameter describes the content of the QR Code, while the "setting" parameter describes its design. Both are documented here: https://github.com/unitag/QRCODES-API/blob/master/documentation.md

required_parameters.name: setting
required_parameters.description: Design of the generated QR Code, documented here: Content of the QR Code, documented here: https://github.com/unitag/QRCODES-API/blob/master/documentation.md#setting-object

required_parameters.name: data
required_parameters.description: Content of the generated QR Code, documented here: https://github.com/unitag/QRCODES-API/blob/master/documentation.md#data-object

optional_parameters.name: size
optional_parameters.description: Size of the output image in pixels (up to 3000, 400 by default). Warning: the parameter must be named SIZE (uppercase), although Mashape appears to force lowercase.

optional_parameters.name: t
optional_parameters.description: Format of the output image: PNG (default), JPEG, SVG or PDF.  Warning: the parameter must be named T (uppercase), although Mashape appears to force lowercase.
